Posts.Content: janey1972 wrote: hi, my name is jane and im forty years old, three years ago i had a mamogram due to a clear/milky discharge it came back it was a cyst in the last three years things have changed slightly an the discharge changed to a really dark coluor nearly black i kept going to my gp who gave me antibiotics time and time again, after a good while i told him i wanted to see sombody else about it, i went today to see a doctor at the breast clinic, he done yet another mamogram and a scan to say that it was ony a cyst or should i say cyst's now an the then went on to say he wanted to remove the ducts to stop the discharge, but at the same time told me that because i smoke(5-15) a day that if he did it there was a chance that the nipple could potentally die. i asked if that did happen would there be anything that could be done he just replied with no,, i am so frightend at the moment because i just dont know what do do, please if anyone has any advice i would be overly greatfull Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: NEED ADVICE!!! janey1972 dlb823
